stupid: she stared at a cup of orange juice for 12 hours because it said 'concentrate.'
when they said it was chilly outside, she grabbed a bowl.
she put lipstick on her forehead to make up her mind.
when they said "Order in the court" she asked for fries and a shake.
she thought a quarterback was a refund.
fat: when she fell I didn't laugh, but the sidewalk cracked up.
when she skips a meal, the stock market drops.
it took me two buses and a train to get to her good side.
when she goes camping, the bears hide their food.
if she buys a fur coat, a whole species will become extinct.
old: I told her to act her own age, and she died.
that when she was in school there was no history class.
she took her drivers test on a dinosaur.
short: people thought she was a Funko Pop.
she went to see Santa, and he told her to get back to work.
you can see her feet on her driverâ€™s license.
she has to slam dunk her bus fare.

ugly: that when she tried to join a ugly contest they said: "Sorry, no professionals".
your grandma had to be drunk to breastfeed her.
when you take her to the zoo the guy at the door says: "Thanks for bringing her back."
